Text:
1) Install "DVDFab Platinum".
2) Do Not Restart
3) Close down DVDFab.
4) Click On "DVDFab Platinum Crack".
5) Click on Automated Cracking 1 (choose between 32 and 64 bit, if you don't know which type your PC is, go for 32 bit)
6) Restart your PC
7) Ignore the "enter regisration key" it is now registered.
7) Open DVDFab and confirm all the parts are set to "Never Expire"
8) Seed.

Enjoy,

TSV.


If you have any trouble with that, there's another way explained in the Installation Instructions. It should work from that though.
